import {i_eye, i_google} from '../../../../public/images' import axios from 'axios' import Part from '../../../components/part' import {Link,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import React,{useState} from 'react' import { UserLogin } from '../../../Redux/Actions/auth' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Login = () =>{ const dispatch = useDispatch() const [loginLoading, setLoginLoading] = useState(false) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '-', password: '-' }) const { data,error } = useSelector((state)=> state.UserLogin) const processLogin = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(UserLogin(formData, setLoginLoading)) } return(
processLogin(e)}>
